thread.title: Grammys 2017: The Most Memorable Looks From the Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017: The Most Memorable Looks From the Red Carpet

title: Grammys 2017: The Most Memorable Looks From the Red Carpet
text: In Givenchy couture and Lorraine Schwartz jewelry sans red lips. Getty Images In a Balmain jumpsuit with thigh-high splits. Getty Images Michele in a midriff-baring Roberto Cavalli look. Getty Images Daya in a chic LBD by Balmain. Getty Images Grey stuns in a shirt gown with a thigh-high slit. Getty Images Halsey gets in on the pajama trend with this electric blue top and pants combo. Getty Images Underwood in a statement-making gown by Elie Madi. Getty Images Klum shows off her long legs in a T-shirt dress by Phillipp Plein. Demi Lovato In a Julian MacDonald gown. Lopez slays in a Ralph and Russo Spring 2017 Haute Couture gown. Jennifer Lopez
